story.title: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...
story.description: My journey into the world of frontend development began in 2019. With the support of GeoLab, I mastered HTML and CSS, and then ventured into learning JavaScript on my own. Eventually, I stumbled upon a YouTube video titled

skills.title: Our Skills
skills.description: We use cutting-edge technologies and methodologies
skills.experienceDescription: These cards contain a short description of the topics I studied for each tool. I studied these tools not separately, but in conjunction with each other.
skills.jsDescription: I chose JavaScript because it is universal, you can write anything on it. I took most of the information from learn javascript.
skills.reactDescription: Today applications are written on frameworks, so for myself I choose React.
skills.reduxDescription: In large applications, developers use state managers. Today one of the most popular is Redux, so I choose it.
skills.sagaDescription: Saga makes application side effects easier to manage, more efficient to execute, easy to test, and better at handling failures.

arts.title: Creating 3D Scenes is My Passion
arts.description: I began exploring Blender and was captivated by its intuitive interface and ease of use. That is how modeling became my favorite hobby.
